Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'D', 'Dansko'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Fashion Sneakers']]
Review Text: I ordered these for the balance between looks and comfort and they do not disappoint. Cute enough to be worn with casual summer dresses and skirt they are sturdy enough and comfortable enough to make walking long distances appealing. The same with standing for long periods. There is a reason that so many nurses and doctors wear the standard Dansko Clog.These do look like the little summer sneakers we love to wear around. Dansko quality is also unmatched. I own 2 pairs of clogs and a pair of boots by Dansko, all of which have lasted years and all of which still look well and are comfortable when worn. Worth the investment. I see from some reviews that some people with foot problems don't like these. Not every shoe is for everybody. Most people love Dansko, so give their ergonomic foot bed and arch support a try and see if it works with your foot. Highest possible recommendation.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'U', 'UGG'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Boots']]
Review Text: I chose this rating because I like them. My 18 year old granddaughter has asked for them for Christmas, (she doesn't know I have them.) She has worn UGG's before, so I know she will love them. As usual, the service from Amazon Prime has been prompt and I love the updates.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'N', 'Nine West'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Handbags & Wallets', 'Top-Handle Bags'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Handbags & Wallets', 'Shoulder Bags']]
Review Text: I'm a graduate student, and I've been using this as my school bag for two quarters & a summer so far! It fits: my Macbook 13" Air in a neoprene case, thin folders, my Kleen Kanteen, wallet, snack, cell phone, lotion, and assorted personal items -- basically, everything I need for a full day of school!This bag can take a lot of weight, and it's held up really well. Because of the way the handles are wrapped and the material, it doesn't seem like I'll need to worry about fraying handles (what killed my other school bags). The only thing is that the black band around the lock fell off after about 6 months of use, but I just chipped the glue off with the edge of a steel ruler, and it looks fine.I recommend it!

My husband is 6'4, 200lbs, XL is slightly too large, my friend is 6', 215 lbs, the xl fits him perfectly.

Review Text: I bought these to take on a cruise.  They're lightweight, the grey color will "go with" almost everything, and they were inexpensive enough that if they take a beating throughout the vacation, they can be disposable.  The workmanship isn't great, but that's OK for the reason I ordered them  Haven't worn them for a length of time yet, but after trying them on I expect they'll be comfortable.  I feel they were a smart buy for my purpose.Earlier I bought the same shoe in a half-size larger (6-1/2) in the suede look.  They were enormous.  I'll keep them, anyhow, to wear around the house.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'K', 'Keen'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Comfort Shoes'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Oxfords']]
Review Text: I've had these shoes for 6 months, wearing 2-4 days per week, as a contractor.  They feel great.  They are easily the most comfortable shoe I have worn in years, and my feet are getting harder to please. The all leather upper is a plus.  The shoe looks good.  The moc toe is a bit of a minus for me, as the stitching around the toe has failed due to the punishment I put the shoe through.  I easily fixed the problem, to my surprise, with some waxed thread and a needle in about 15 minutes.  The repair looks good as new, and will outlast the shoe.  They are a bit on the warm side, but tolerable.  The sole is wearing well.  I will look for another pair when these finally wear out.

Review Text: I never knew about Merino until my recent trip to New York.  I grew up thinking that all wool products were itchy and uncomfortable.  After wearing Merino, I don't think that I could ever go back to the synthetics like BodyArmor and other brands employ.  The Merino kept me warm when out in the freezing temperatures of New York but cool enough to wear indoors with the heater on, too -- Hell, I have worn it on several early morning hikes after returning to Arizona.  Extremely comfortable and doesn't pill when washed like another merino shirt that I ordered.

Review Text: This dress is really pretty and FUN! I hate that the top is too large for my 36C bust. Im between a 10&12 and ordered the 12 which im glad I did because the zipper was barely getting up otherwise. There are three rows of rhinestones on the empire waist, making your waist seem smaller-who doesn't love that! I ordered two Ever Pretty shawls to go with too-"Fuschia & Aqua" and that combo would have been amazing with the dress had it worked for me. I highly recommend to others to add these shawls/wraps. Unfortunately I need to ship it back because the top was too large- as in way too large. That was a wardwrobe malfunction in the making- lol. Oh- length wise....I am 5'2-5'3" and the longest part hit the floor without heels. The shortest was knee length- perfect! Did I mention the colors are amazing! I love Ever Pretty! This is the only place I will shop for special occasion dresses from now on. Their service is amazing as well as their products! Cant beat that!

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Accessories', 'Scarves & Wraps', 'Fashion Scarves']]
Review Text: I ordered this scarf in red because it matches my black flip-flops that are adorned with shiny red roses. I wanted something to match that would look good with jeans and several tops in my wardrobe. Since I'm a "funky" kind of gal, the peace signs in the pattern appealed to me, also, and the size is perfect, allowing me to fashion it in a variety of styles.I wasn't exactly sure what "viscose" is and feared it might be rough and scratchy. So when this pretty scarf arrived, the first thing I did was toss it around my neck to get a feel for the texture. I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable and light it felt. When I run my fingers across the material, it feels soft as feathers. To wax poetic, it feels as I imagine a fleecy cloud would feel. :-)I loooooooove my new scarf so much I'm wearing it to a friend's birthday BBQ tomorrow. In fact, I'm going back to order several in different colors. Highly recommended!Reviewed by Betty Dravis, July 16, 2010Author of "Dream Reachers" (with Chase Von) and other books

Review Text: I ordered this purse for my 30-something sister for Christmas. She loved it! It is large and roomy, but can be buttoned-down to a more square shape. It has two zippered inner pockets, a cell phone pocket, and two other open pockets. My sister said she loved the tasteful animal print and the chrome accents. She actually received 3 purses for Christmas but this was the first one she filled and used. :) I also included aWild Animal Safari Purse Hanger - ** Various Designs **in a matching zebra print which she also thought was great. Summary: For a narrow shoe, once adding additional insole, they are working
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'C', 'Clarks'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Comfort Shoes'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Loafers & Slip-Ons']]
Review Text: Needed casual shoe in 9.5N or 10N.  Ordered in 9.5N.  At first my toes were hitting end of shoe, even though space at heel, so knew going up a size not a good option.  After wearing for a short time indoors, decided I should return them but missed the return window.  I have added another pair of Clarks insoles from a 10N pair (Wave Treks), and they are now more comfortable and fit well.  Would have given higher star rating if the additional insoles weren't required.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'N', 'Nine West'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Pumps']]
Review Text: I trust Nine West shoes because I've yet to buy a pair on Amazon that wasn't as described. That said - these are everything I hoped they'd be - great fit, good leather and well-made. The platform around the toe balances heel height so these are comfortable to walk in and wear for long periods. I love the croc leather style that makes this peep toe unique + purchased this beautiful pump from amazon at a better than sale price bargain. Although I hesitated at first to purchase from the "Used" - tried on but not worn" category, this pair looks brand new and shipping was first class. Perfect!

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'C', 'Columbia'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Coats & Jackets', 'Fleece']]
Review Text: It's actually the first time I've bought a fleece jacket (I'm in my 30s). Was traveling to Europe in the winter and needed an extra layer under my coat. This worked perfectly! I loved the zippered pockets, which I could put valuables in. I thought I'd get a lot of static shock (a main reason why I never bought a fleece before), but surprisingly didn't. Now, I'm back in Cali and wear it all the time. It's the perfect light jacket that is also super warm. I often pull the collar up to keep my neck warm, thus eliminating the need for a scarf when I don't feel like wearing one.

Summary: Good support, Very Comfortable,, Accurate sizing
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'B', 'Bearpaw'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Slippers']]
Review Text: I've been on a mission to find a decent slipper with foot support, comfort, and proper sizing. I usually get the super cheap Chandra i think its called, from a store with a red bullseye but oddly, they think people only wear slippers at Christmas so if yours wear out, you have to wait until November for your size to be widely available (7-7.5).  These are almost the same shoe, with the same strong support and bottom, same cushioned feel, good looking and accurate sizing- at 3x's the sale price of the Chandra ($8). The sole is not as thick as the Chandra but it doesn't seem to effect the support quality so it's okay. But my feet have been killing me from my old slippers having no more support left so I couldn't wait any longer.Bought a size 7 (I get the other in 7.5) - these fit perfectly except I would rather have the half size bigger for my thick furry socks. But they still can be worn with my socks so it works just fine. Accurate sizing matters - I tried Isotoner in a 7.5-8 and my foot hung off the back and the regular was so narrow, there was no fitting it with anything but a bare foot and then they were still much too short, not anywhere close to what is considered "standard" 7-7.5 much less 7.5-8 which should be too big on my 7 foot. So sizing should give them a bonus star for being a size that I typically would wear in any shoe.  THANK YOU for not wasting my money on a huge size 7 or a tiny tiny size 7!Accurate sizingStrong supportRubber sole - stiff with cushioned footbedVery comfortableGood LookingCONS:No half sizes availablePrice - it hurts to spend $30 on a slipper when I usually spend $8, $12 if I can't wait for a sale, like now.

Summary: Made in USA & PERFECT Garden Boot
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Outdoor', 'Rain Footwear']]
Review Text: I got a 9 in the Sloggers Paisley Tallboot, I love it!  Im usually an 8.5 so with Socks this is the perfect size to slip off & on,  I love that I am buying something  I need, that is Great quality & that is Made in the USA,  I have knee high insulated rain boots for the pasture, but I wanted something better for Summer, & the Red Paisley is true to the Photo, nice & fun & bright, lightweight sides really more low calf than mid calf in height but are well made with a soft fabric lining, Great support soles, and are soft & flexible & have been wonderful to garden in the last week, and chase my little ones *helping* in the garden.  We live on acreage & have a large garden to tend, & in Texas, so its not quite super hot yet, but I have to say, i think i totally made the right choice & for a few dollars over the cheap ones at Target, got something I can be proud of supporting USA, and a much better boot that should last me quite a while

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'L', 'Lucky Brand'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops & Tees', 'Knits & Tees']]
[['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Novelty, Costumes & More', 'Novelty', 'Clothing', 'Women', 'Accessories', 'Belts']]
Review Text: I like the idea of the Invisibelt very much, as I have that constant issue of gaping waistlines with my pants. So I ordered this one January this year, and more than half a year later of usage, I'm a bit iffy on the quality.The belt itself is sturdy, made of clear plastic that isn't flimsy, which I liked. Based on other reviews about this belt I agree that it has a little bulge on the adjustment loop portion -- but to me that's not much of an issue, as I don't wear super-fit shirts anyway (I wear it more so to remediate the gaping waistline issue), but I can see how that poses a problem to people who want to wear fitted shirts over it.The buckles and adjustment loops are strong enough. I do wish they have this in a more "translucent" plastic, as during my usage the indigo jeans tend to bleed out and stain the edges of this belt, so it's not so "invisible" anymore when you use it on khakis (or maybe get the black one to wear it with dark jeans -- I just wanted to get the clear one expecting it to be flexible for dark and light pants).The main reason why I'm saying it's "just OK" is that while I do not wear the belt frequently the past 6 months (not all of my pants need the belt), the stitching that holds the buckle is not too strong. Right now the stitching is starting to snap off bit by bit and I'm pretty sure it's not going to last on the next wear. I am not  even putting stress on it (I don't force my belt too tightly) -- I'd say that they need to improve the quality of the stitching -- maybe make a double parallel stitch rather than just one?Anyhow, there aren't really better options that I like out there for "invisible belts" so I'm going to give Invisibelt another chance. Hopefully my 2nd one lasts longer.

Review Text: I have never owned Crocs before mostly because I thought they were ugly.  But I was looking for a comfortable, but nice looking clog and saw these and decided to take a chance on them since we would be going on vacation and I wanted something to wear that would be easy to take on and off in an airport through security.  These were comfortable right out of the box, kept my feet toasty warm even on the coldest day outside and my feet felt great even after walking for several miles in them on vacation.  I was so happy with them, I came home from vacation and ordered another similar pair of Crocs!

Categories: [['Sports & Outdoors', 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Running', 'Clothing', 'Women', 'Tights'], ['Sports & Outdoors', 'Clothing', 'Women', 'Pants', 'Compression Pants'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Active Leggings'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Active', 'Active Leggings']]
Review Text: These pants are OK.  I am not sure what I expected, but they do the job just fine.  They do not "refresh" my legs, but maybe I just do not notice after 3 hours?  A word to anyone larger out there - I ordered the size listed on their chart given my height and weight.  The pants arrived looking like they would fit a 2 yr old but, having read other reviews, I got them on (no easy feat).  Given that they are very snug everywhere except the waist, I find they chafe badly at the waist.  I have tried tightening the draw string (which is ridiculously long) but it doesnt help.  As a result, I now only wear these for runs of 30-45 minutes, anything longer and I wear the $15 pair I got from TJMAXX.

Review Text: It's beautiful for your pre-teen or teen aged daughter or granddaughter.  Well made and very sparkly in the light both the stone and the chain (the chain is a real surprise and a delight).  The pearl is well simulated and clean with a reflective quality all its own.  The cubic zirconia is big enough to be noticed and adds luster to the overall piece.  The price is right and it's time to find those stocking stuffers!!!

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Socks', 'Casual Socks']]
Review Text: Let me clarify the product description: Each "10 pack" contains 20 individual socks, it is 10 pairs of socks. This is entirely unclear on the product page as of 2014-04-14. For roughly $10, you get 20 socks. 20 perfect socks.These have been my favorite socks for several years. I have size 10 feet (US men's size), and these fit perfectly.The material is very soft and rather warm. The material is somewhat thick, which I like. The material does not tend to form pills of lint, which is fantastic.The elastic is just right. These socks do not fall down, but they also don't strangle my calves.These socks do not last forever, but how much can you ask of a 50-cent sock?

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'C', 'Clarks'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Comfort Shoes'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Sandals']]

Review Text: I love these flip flops! I have two pairs now and just adore them. They are extremely comfortable and last for years! They do get slippery when you get them wet, so beware not to fall. These flops did rub my foot raw where the cloth hit it, but only because one of the egdes was raised a bit. I just got the material wet and put a barret there to mold the material flat, instead of raised. Worked like a charm and they are super comfy!

Review Text: It's so hard to find one piece swimsuits for babies that are cute. Review Text: I purchased this wristlet in the Violet color, and it is exactly as pictured, and it arrived a day before the delivery window started. Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Active Base Layers'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Big & Tall']]
Review Text: Indera has a similar item sold on this site for about the same cost. If you want a thermal top that will only be used on rare occasions (for example, winter trips where you'll be outdoors in the snow a lot) then fine. Save the money, but don't buy this.  Buy the Indera.Essential Items' product, which is after all labeled "Essential Apparel", not "Occasional Apparel", does not stand up well to daily use.  My guy lives in them whenever he is not working. I hang my head in shame to have placed this in his stocking (along with Indera's, which merits one more star), when I should have shelled out for Ralph Lauren's, which he deserves--heavier weight (and much warmer), closer threads, tight weave, well finished--than this ridiculous thing, which is nearly ready for the rag bag.I should have known from the price not to have high expectations, but it was well rated on amazon.com, so I bought it.  I left the tag in so I can avoid making the same mistake twice.  Better still: for the man who asks for so very little and uses these so much, I will drive myself to Macy's or go there online, and purchase Ralph Lauren thermals again. The one and only that he owns is in beautiful shape after YEARS of wear, and he gets cold easily.  This was a stupid purchase, which won't be repeated.The seller was very prompt in delivery and should not be blamed.

Summary: It is Itchy and it Shrank

Summary: Great jacket, tight through shoulders though.
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'C', 'Columbia'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Coats & Jackets', 'Fleece']]
Review Text: I am 5'9, 135 lbs and I normally wear a medium so it fits my broader shoulders well, which are about 19" shoulder to shoulder. Most other reviews say this jacket runs large so I figured a medium would be fine. This jacket is roomy everywhere but the shoulder line. It hugs the peak of the shoulders snug enough to make it a little uncomfortable if you need to move around alot, which would be fine for a shirt, but since your wearing a shirt under this, it is a little uncomfortable.I can wear form fitting shirts under this but forget a tshirt. I would have liked the jacket to be a little longer as well. Fleece is nice and thick but it does look to be see through if you hold it up to the light. I am hesitant to wash this as I feel it will shrink and be even smaller through shoulders. Overall I am pleased with this purchase but I feel the shoulder fit doesn't match the rest of the jacket fit. The collar could be thinner for me too, so it lays nicer. I am undecided if I will buy another color.

Summary: Not sexy but a good option

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'S', 'Saucony'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Fashion Sneakers']]
Review Text: The Jazz Low Pros are my particularly favorite style of Sauconys, probably because of the retro-ness of this style. I have a gray pair and the yellow/navy pair, both in size 9M. These are incredibly comfortable and great for walking on concrete. Lots of support and bounce.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie, Sleep & Lounge', 'Intimates', 'Accessories', 'Adhesive Bras']]
Review Text: The bra works very well for backless tops and dresses. I've worn it three times. I have performed and danced on stage and it has not come off, so the adhesive works very well. It comes with easy instructions for cleaning but it takes a while to dry, so don't try to clean it the same day that you plan to wear it! It also has a very seamless look to it, so you can't tell you're wearing it through thin material, which is nice. The only complaint I have is that I expected it (based on the description and reviews) to be more of a push-up. This thing does not push up or enhance my breasts at all.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'Dress Shirts'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Big & Tall']]
Review Text: I ordered this and looked forward to having a really cool looking shirt with a unique style. Unfortunately for me, my body type and the shirt's cut did not match up.I read previous reviews that said, the shirts were really made for a super slim body type and they are not telling a lie. Unless you are super skinny, don't even think about it. Even if you order up two sizes larger, there is still a chance the arms are too thin and the shoulder span is too narrow.On the good side, the company is very understanding and cooperative about a problem.I sent my measurements to them and told them when they start making them for an American body, I would be happy to own many of their shirts.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Handbags & Wallets', 'Cross-Body Bags']]
Review Text: I wanted a small diaper bag that didn't look like a diaper bag; just something for short trips around town. I can fit a couple of diapers, a small package of wipes, a change of clothing for baby, a bottle, burp cloth, small changing pad, pacifier, plus my wallet, phone and keys. When my baby was a small infant, the two end pockets would perfectly  hold the 2-ounce Enfamil newborn instant bottles. Now they hold my sunglasses. It fits nicely over the handles of my stroller, and I can wear it cross-body which makes it easier when carrying baby. This has been perfect, and when I am done using it as a diaper bag it will make a great purse.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Boots']]
Review Text: I'm pretty pleased with these, I bought them for just about 29 bucks in a 6.5 which is my normal size. They needed a small amount of breaking in (I've had them for about 3 weeks now) because they were tight around the top of the foot and the heel. But they seem to be loosening. I was a little worried that they'd be too high because I'm short, (5'2) but they come to just below my knee which is perfect.The heel makes an authoritative "click click click" on pavement but it's a rubber heel so it's not too loud (I only mention this because I have a funny pet peeve...I hate it when shoes have a hard plastic heel and make a sharp clicking sound when you walk)Another weird shoe noise thing (Apparently I like my shoes silent, heh). The zippers are on the inside of the leg, so they clink against each other, which for the first few days made me think I was constantly dropping coins out of my pocket. But it's not too annoying.They seem to be waterproof which is nice. I think they were worth it for under $30, but I don't know how long they're going to hold up, so I would be wary about spending more on them.

Review Text: I ordered two of these, and as presented, they are heavy weight and nice to wear over a long sleeve tee. I have two complaints about them, however. I washed them in warm water and dried them on medium heat, but both have shrunk in length. I would suggest hanging them to dry, but since they are made of heavy weight material, it might take a while! The other complaint is that the neck area seems smaller than most. I have a normal sized head, and I stretch out the neck before putting it over my head so I don't pull out all my hair. I ordered a red one and a purple one, and they do hold their color well.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops & Tees', 'Blouses & Button-Down Shirts']]

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Slippers'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', "Women's Luxury Brands"]]
Review Text: I bought these not expecting too much given the price, but I have been pleasantly surprised! These boots are super comfy and not to mention super cute. I love the little satin bow with the fuzzy pom poms on the back. Adorable!These slipper boots come up to just about mid calf on me, which is just about perfect for a winter slipper. The top can also fold down to make the boots shorter if you start to get too warm in them. These keep my feet nice and toasty, but don't make them sweat like some other slipper boots that I have owned.I wear a size 9/10 in women's shoes and I purchased the large size and they fit me perfectly. They are not too tight or too loose, but still give me room to wiggle my toes when wearing them. They have a slight amount of textured grip on the bottom, so you don't slip when walking over tile floor too.I've been wearing them every night since I received them and they have have held up nicely and don't come apart as long as they are washed on the gentle cycle and tumbled dry. So far, these are my favorite slipper boots for this season!

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie, Sleep & Lounge', 'Intimates', 'Panties', 'Hipsters']]

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Winter Promo'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'T', 'Timberland PRO'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Boot Shop', 'Men', 'Outdoor & Work', 'Work & Safety'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Boots']]
Review Text: I've owned a pair of Timberland PRO Men's Titan 6" Waterproof Safety Tow Work Boots for at least two years. This is by far the most comfortable boot that I've ever placed on my feet. They are lightweight, easy to lace up and mold to your feet; you don't even realize they're there. These boots are steel toe equipped and slip resistant, which comes in handy in my line of work. They are easy to keep clean and durable. I walk a lot at work on anything from blacktop to crush and run stones. My feet always feel comfortable and safe. I would recommend these boots to anyone seeking a comfortable and durable work boot.Please rate this review if you found it helpful.

Review Text: Got the ring on time, but the first day my hubby wore it: Lost a stone.We have had this for about 2wks now, it still sparkels and lucky the stone fell out on the far side so you can't see it. I will have to keep looking for a sturdy and affordable bling ring for my man...

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Jewelry', 'Rings'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Novelty, Costumes & More', 'Novelty']]
Review Text: This was my fiance's first ring choice but unfortunately we went with something else. After we received the other ring, we immediately had buyers's remorse. I bought this ring the same day and received it pretty quickly. As soon as I opened it, I knew right away it was perfect. It's heavy, but my fiancé and I both agree that a man's wedding band should feel like it has weight to it. Looks exactly like the picture and fits perfectly. We ordered an 8.5. The band width is thick enough so it doesn't look cheap. It's shiny and just absolutely beautiful. It seems very durable too so all in all we are very happy with this purchase. Great value for a great meaningful ring!

Summary: Gems don't go all the way around and the diamond is off center.
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Gemstones'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Jewelry: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Amazon Curated Collection'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Jewelry', 'Fine', 'Rings'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Novelty, Costumes & More', 'Novelty']]
Review Text: I was expecting this to be big, I got it for my thumb and it sure is big.  I can barely bend my thumb with it on, but that's not what bothers me.What bothers me is the ring doesn't go all the way around.  What you see is what you get.. literally.  What you do not see in the picture is that it < and gets slightly smaller as it rounds around the back in plain coated gold.  I guess I should have known, but you can't tell by looking at the picture.Another disappointment is the diamond accent.  I thought it would be in the middle of the sapphire, that makes sense.. I knew the top and bottom would be polished silver, but no it's at the bottom of the main sapphire and it's NOT centered.  It looks awkward off to the side.. that is if you can even tell it is there.The ring doesn't fit in my jewelry box either due to it's size, I guess I should have thought about that.Given being able to do it again, I would give it some major thought and might still do it because it matches a bracelet I bought off here, but I would have given so much for it ($35).

Review Text: That's the best way I can describe it. This dress is interesting. It's cute, don't get me wrong! It just fits weird. No one would notice looking at me that it fits weird but I feel it! I'm 5'7" about 145-150 pounds. Small waist, bigger hips... and it's like the shoulder part doesn't fit. Weird I know, but that's the best way I can describe it. I can't really put my arms above my head and I can't really move my arms around much. Everything else is fine though. I actually haven't worn this yet because comfort is as important as anything else to me when it comes to dressing up. I would say this would get a 4 star for cuteness and 2 star for comfort, so I go with a 3.

Summary: Pretty but STABBY ... both with the underwires and your bust shape
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie, Sleep & Lounge', 'Intimates', 'Bras', 'Everyday Bras'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Intimates', 'Bras', 'Everyday Bras'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Plus-Size']]
Review Text: I bought this bra in 4 sizes (32 FF and G, and 34 FF and G), determined to get one that worked. Well, the 32FF fit best, and the cups nicely covered the whole bust area, but the underwires go up weirdly high in the center and kind of stabbed my sternum. (Some reviewers had this issue with the wires up under your arms, but I didn't have trouble there--only in the center.) This happened with all 4 of the sizes, so I think it's an issue of the make vs personal fit.Also, this definitely gives you a 50s torpedo shape to your bustline. Even with the underwire issue, it was pretty and priced well enough that I considered keeping it ... until I put on a shirt and looked in the mirror. Everything was very high, separated, and pointy. I know some women like that lift, but as a somewhat younger consumer (29) I prefer a more rounded, natural look.You also don't really get any cleavage line since everything is lifted so far apart. Again, that may be preferable for you.

Categories: [['Sports & Outdoors', 'Snow Sports', 'Skiing', 'Clothing', 'Men'], ['Sports & Outdoors', 'Clothing', 'Men', 'Shirts'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Active Shirts & Tees'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Big & Tall']]

That needed to be put on the outside.  I'm not a wus either - I ran in -34 degrees last week with my cedar point / cedar fair windbreaker, a long sleeve cotton shirt, and a short sleeve cotton shirt for extra core warmth and was fine.  This thing is awful!!  I wouldn't recommend it, not for COLD weather, which is what I wanted it for.  It's thick, the suade part, but the shiny inner makes it cold.

Review Text: Well, I ordered 2 of this belts on february 2011, so they have some 15 months of use. I ordered this belts for gun carry because the add said "full grain bridle leather from Italy" and nothing more, so I belive they were MADE IN USA; BUT these belts are MADE IN CHINA, and the page does not state they are imported PRODUCTS, so this is my first complain. About the belt quality itself is not terrible bad, but they are not stiff enough as I expected, you can easily bend the belt from his wide. In this same price range you can get a much better belt from Boston Leather,  made in the USA from a much stiffer true 8-9 ounces leather and 7 holes instead of 5. Certanly I will not buy another belt from Carhartt.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Jeans'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Plus-Size', 'Jeans']]
Review Text: Levi's are my absolute favorite jeans.  I am thick through the waist, hips and thighs. The 512 and 542 Levi's styles are the most comfortable for my shape.  The sizing is unpredictable/inconsistent so if you don't have the patience to deal with that inconvenience then you may want to seek a different brand.  For me, no other brand compares.  I ordered 3 pairs of this style in the same size but all different colors.  Two pairs measured 37"-38" in the waist - perfect.  One pair (unscripted) measured 34" in the waist - too small.  Other than the sizing issues, these jeans are very comfortable.  They hug in a way that looks good on a plus size woman.  The back pockets are positioned perfectly. The tummy panel is great with one exception - very shallow front pockets.  I carry nothing important in the front pockets because they are so shallow. That's not really an issue for me as don't carry things in my pockets anyway.  In the rare need for pockets, the back pockets are my choice. They are boot cut but not too wide as is the case with many other boot cut jeans.  I don't like the flare leg look nor do I like the skinny leg look. I simply love these jeans!!Regarding my experience with sizing:Being a repeat Levi's customer for 30+ years; I have noticed what seems to be a trend depending on where the jeans were made. First, let me emphasize that when these were made exclusively in the USA, I wore the 550 style and I never encountered erratic sizing issues to the point of "doesn't fit at all" that I sometimes encounter now.  As with most clothing brands, they started manufacturing in other countries in order to compete and to stay in business.  When ordered in my normal size:-Made in China runs between too small to perfect sizing.-Made in Pakistan runs between perfect sizing to too large.-I have never received jeans made in China that were too large and I have never received jeans made in Pakistan that were too small.-Made in Pakistan is more often perfect sizing than those Made in China. (In my recent order, 2 pairs from Pakistan fit perfect while one pair from China was too small)OK, I know that may not be very helpful but I wanted to share it because this explains why one reviewer states; these jeans are too small, the next reviewer states; these jeans are too big, and then the next reviewer states; I should have just ordered my normal size.  In my experience I find it is best to just order my normal size because I win more often that way.  Notice that I said more often, not always. It is most probable that hundreds of happy customers order their normal size and simply do not bother to write reviews.

I'd really prefer to send them back and have them replaced but there are no options available to do so unless I've missed something somewhere.

If you have a lot of extra weight, you will most likely experience discomfort in the crotch where the sides sit against your inner thighs.

Review Text: The Moab Ventilator is a great shoe.  I've had a half a dozen over the past several years.  They last 2-3 years of good use then they are due for replacement. It's not that they break or fall apart but they get "soft". It's like when your razor gets a little duller each day.  You don't realize how dull it was until you replace it. You'll feel like you are walking on air with your new Moabs.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Winter Promo'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'S', 'Steve Madden'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Boot Shop', 'Women', 'Fashion', 'Combat'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Boots']]
Review Text: I was hesitant about ordering this boot due to the mixed reviews on Amazon. However, I am glad that I did. I had purchased a few other similar styled boots that were made of synthetics and was not quite satisfied with them. I was determined to find a leather boot that I loved. So, I gave these a try because they were the exact style I was looking for. I purchased them in the Wine color (a dark maroon color with the toe being slightly darker on the very tip) , which is quite gorgeous and goes with everything. The leather was a bit stiff at first, but I never found them to be uncomfortable. I cannot comment on the durability seeing as I've only had them for about a week. But, they are truly cute and very functional. I can wear them to work or out on the weekend. I am considering buying another pair in a different color as well. They do not have a lot of cushion, but I prefer that.Just to mention, the pair I purchased was fulfilled by Amazon and I did not have any quality issues. They are brand-new, state that they were made in Mexico and have no defects.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Skirts', 'Casual']]
Review Text: I love SO much about this skirt! The length is perfect, the fit is awesome, and it is super flattering....but there is 1 BIG problem! You can see EVERYTHING underneath. There is no solving this problem- I tried black, nude, and no underwear...this skirt is not wearable! So sad i had to return it!

Review Text: I have 9 of these watches in different colors. I love them! As a nursing student my uniform is very strict no earrings, no necklaces they even wanted us to take off our wedding bands if they were "high" set. So you feel no room to express yourself. I do it with these watches and if one gets wrecked it's no big deal to replace it. My goal is to own one in every color :)

I've used them for both pavement and trails, as well as speed and endurance. They are excellent shoes and still have life in them.

Review Text: I read most of the reviews of this dress and still wasn't sure about the zippers on the shoulders.  Let me tell you, they make this dress!  I have yet to see anything in the stores like this.  You can close them and make it less revealing or unzip them a little for an off the shoulder or slouched look.  The fitted bottom flatters a girl's curves and, when paired with fall boots and fun colors tights, make for a great going out or holiday get together dress.  This is quickly becoming my "go to" dress and I get compliments on it all the time.  I ordered my normal size and it fit my average, 5 foot frame perfectly.

Review Text: Have this bag, as well as two other colors: white and the giraffe print  (see my review on the giraffe bag) and love them all.  Good quality and good value. Size is perfect for everyday bag; holds alot, plus my Samsung tablet.  Love the snaps for security.  Love the touch of gold. The shoulder drop is perfect for me at 5'4", and works just as well for my friend who is taller.Does it look like a $200 bag? Of course not. Review Text: I like these because they are not too lightweight and not too heavy. They have a below waist cut, which I prefer and there is no hem ( which is no big deal to me). The waistband is odd though. Like a previous review said, it has this tiny string in a large area, so when it's tied the gathering does look weird and uneven. I'm gonna have to fix it somehow. Also, they shrink a lot so be sure and wash them in cold water and hang to dry. I'm 5'6" and weigh 135 lbs and ordered a medium, which fits fine. Hope this helps.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'C', 'Carhartt'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Big & Tall'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Novelty, Costumes & More', 'Work Wear & Uniforms', 'Clothing', 'Work Utility & Safety', 'Men', 'Pants']]
Review Text: I got the green, as I wanted warm, strong, casual pants that can also be dressy enough to go in winter.  They are a work pant but nice enough to wear business-casual with a dress shirt & tie if you want, and in the winter when it's freezing they are exactly what I need.  They are so comfortable that I don't get hot when I'm inside reg temps, (I often wear them at home) and when outside, I don't notice the cold.  I work in sales, which means having a professional appearance, and these look pretty good.  And, in Chicago winter, these keep the frigid air out.  Who cares if they do not look like suit pants?  When slipping on the ice you'll be quite glad you have these.  I really notice the difference on days that I don't wear them.  Now, I'm ordering black for a dressier look.  And b/c I wear them almost every day, along with Carhartt lined jeans.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Oxfords']]
Review Text: The shoes I bought do NOT look like the shoes in the picture. I got the brown ones and the laces are a completely different color from the shoe (almost orange). The material is not suede at all. It's a scratchy, bristly surface and the material of the shoe is stiff and cheap-feeling. They look way nicer in the picture.I bought these shoes true to size (I'm a 6.5 M) and they fit almost perfectly, except they are a little big at the openings. I'm going to keep them even though I don't like them because of the high shipping charge that I wouldn't get reimbursed for :( I will try to get as much wear out of them as possible before they inevitably fall apart. If the laces were the right color, they would be cute, but I do not recommend buying this product because it is such bad quality (and I don't have very high standards for shoes). And what the other reviewers said about the smell is true-- there is a horrible smell in the shoes that is not going away; I thought it wouldn't bother me but it does.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'D', 'Dockers'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Wallets, Card Cases & Money Organizers', 'Wallets'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Novelty, Costumes & More', 'Band & Music Fan', 'Accessories']]
Review Text: I am very pleased with this wallet.  I just replaced an old wallet that was nearly square and, once filled with my cards and pictures, was hard to extract from my rear pocket.  This wallet, as you can see from the product image, is more rectangular and is easier to get in and out of my pocket.There are two rather minor items that caused me to withdraw one star.  First, some of the card slots on the center flap are too narrow to hold the standard credit cards.  These are cards that fit without a problem in any of the six slots on the main part of the wallet.  That reduced the number of useable card slots from nine to seven.  The other two are usable for things like membership cards, without a magnetic stripe, if you trim about 1/16th of an inch off the card.The other item is a real nit.  You need to order an add on picture insert as an additional purchase.  This should have been included with the wallet.However, the wallet appears to be of quality materials and construction.  Overall, I am very pleased with the purchase and expect many years of use from it.

Summary: Great looking time piece, but set up is not user freindly
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Jewelry: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Available for International Shipping'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Citizen'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Watches', 'Wrist Watches']]
Review Text: I've been looking to purchase this Citizen time piece from Amazon for the last few months, but never could pull the trigger. To my surprise, I rec'd it as a anniversary gift from my GF just last week :-D At first impression out of the box, overall the fit and finish is of high quality and fits the price point. On the negative sides, the directions(manual and cd-rom) makes setting up the time, calendar, date on the watch way too complicated. I found myself going over it over and over again till I happen to stumble upon the right sequences to set the watch correctly.I'm an avid watch collector and some of my very high end time pieces are easier to set up than this watch from Citizen. The alarm is perfect and does the job of waking me up from my slumber. I have yet to see the effectiveness and potental of the perpertual calendar.The uni-directional bezel is way to tight when turning counter-clockwise, I almost thought it was defective at first. The luminous hands, dial markers and center mark on the bezel shine brightly.Overall, I like this time piece from Citizen and welcome it into my ever expanding collection of wrist watches.

Review Text: I have learned with All of Allegra K's clothing(which I LOVE by the way) that if you want the clothes to look on you as they do on the Asian model you must order a size up. This has worked with all the clothes I have ordered from her so far EXCEPT this one. I usually wear a medium so I order all large tops from her to achieve the baggy look. This looks like a normal shirt on me. Might sound crazy but to achieve the models look I might go 2 or even 3 sizes up. I might also add that there are plenty of people who post about the poor quality of allegra ks clothing, which I have not found to be the case at all. Material is always strong and comfortable, but I would say this is the thinnest, maybe the cheapest of all that I have ordered. I probably would not purchase this again ONLY because I desired the look on the model, not just what looks like a normal shirt its so small.

Categories: [['Sports & Outdoors', 'Accessories', 'Sport Watches'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'New Arrivals'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Sport Watches'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Watches', 'Wrist Watches'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', "Men's Athletic Watches"]]
Review Text: When I unpacked the instruction book I initially thought it would be hard to set. The book is thick, but is two languages,and very complete in it's instruction. Also the watch gives you time to do the job. Most electronic gear (radios, watches, etc.) flip you out of the setting screen, back to the function screen too fast. This watch gives you about a minute, making the setting very easy for my clumsy hands and slow brain. After setting the time, date, including the year, you must choose a city to indicate your time zone. That's it. Now the watch has the phases of the moon, the tides, and the UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) for your time zone. If you need precise tides, you can enter the exact time of high tide in your area. I learned a lot about the moon and tides (there are different tides!) setting up this watch and checking its functions.This is a lot of watch for very little money.

Review Text: I've worn a medium in men's clothing my whole adult life. It's ironic that this is a "swim" shirt, because I "swam" in it. As I was deciding whether I could have the sleeves shortened by a tailor,  rather than go through the hassle of returning it, I saw the big snag in the material in front of the shirt. I returned it. It cost me $8 to return it and Amazon reimbursed me $4.59 (where they got that number, I have no idea). If you insist on brand name "Speedo" order it a size smaller. However, don't look for a "small." They don't offer one on Amazon.

Summary: Good, but Under Armour BoxerJock is better
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing']]
Review Text: I bought two pairs of these.  Size small, I'm 5'7", waist 32".  The fit is good, but I feel like the Under Armour boxerjocks offer much better compression.  Just a tight feel all around.  The problem with both is that they make me hot.  It's hard to wear these on a regular basis because they don't offer the breathing room like regular boxers do.  I was hoping that these ExOfficio boxers were a little "cooler", but they were not.  I'll be wearing these to play sports, but not for daily use.

Review Text: I have a high arch, and ordered these sandals because I live in flipflops over the summer and need good support.  I was disappointed.  While I can really detect the metatarsal support they provide, in the center of the ball of my foot -- the arch support is not nearly what I thought it would be.  The tops are made from very soft vinyl plastic, and the cupped heels do help hold your foot in place.  For the money, I'm not going to return them, because I go thru sandals quickly.  I would recommend them but in my opinion, the arch support is not as good as advertised.  PS I ordered the carmel and coffee color, which is actually more of a very soft pale yellow.

Review Text: I have 3 other pair of ROC pants that are not made in China.  I ordered the same color for both pairs and contacted this company to change the color of one if they had not ordered.  They said they would make the change as the order had not been placed.  I received the pants and they were made in China and didn't fit anything like the other 3 do.  I contacted the company and asked for prepaid return address for UPS.  The first printable return was too large to get the tracking number on it.  This was emailed from Zac.  I call back and Dylan resent me one that was still a page large but did have the tracking number.  I received an email that UPS had scanned it my account would be refunded soon.  I still have not received a confirmation from Backcountry and they tell me that there was no order made under my email account.  Fortunately, I use the Amazon visa card and there is not balance due as of today the 22nd of June.  If you have an REI or Academy sports in your city, I would encourage you to purchase from them as you can check the country they are manufactured in.  I refuse to purchase anything made in China due to them arming the enemy or a war I participated in.

Review Text: Despite how it took forever to receive this dress, the lack of tracking information and miscommunication with the seller, I am still very happy with this purchase. The foto is very accurate, the length, cut, pockets and colour of the dress are all the same as the details, minus the buttons at each side of the pockets (which are hard to see in the foto). I'm very busty (34ddd) but have a small frame (25 waist, 36 hip) and I ordered the small. It actually fit perfectly and hugs in all the right places, I'm glad I didn't have to order a size up like I normally do.If you don't mind a month or more wait and having no tracking information (unless you pay even more in shipping costs for an upgraded service), then I would really recommend the purchase.

Categories: [['Sports & Outdoors', 'Accessories', 'Sport Watches'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'New Arrivals'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Jewelry: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Fashion Watches'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Available for International Shipping'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Sport Watches'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Invicta'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Watches', 'Wrist Watches']]
Review Text: This makes hubbies 8th Invicta watch and he loves each and everyone as if they were a prized jewel.  I wasn't sure when I placed the order for this one cause it was orange but it's really not bad.  The orange is more of a tangerine and really shows off the black face and bezel.  It's a big watch but not too over powering.  Hubby says this will be his work horse watch during the summer months when he's outside doing all the little list of jobs I create for him to do during the summer months.Tim says this is a really nice watch for the money and actually a bargin considering what you get.  The chronograph works fantastic and he loves have the GMT time.  Having been in the Navy he's used to the GMT more than our civilian time.  The numbers are large and easy to read against the black background and the movement of the hands is quite smooth.  Only thing he wishes it had was some really nice lume.The watch strap is about as comfortable as you can get ad doesn't slip around on the wrist.  It actually looks good on me too so I might just be borrowing this in the Autumn months when I tend to wear more earthy colors.  I would rather a small watch but this one looks so good on that I really don't mind the size and once you wear it for a bit you get used to the size difference.  All in all this is another major keeper for us and I can't stress enough the name Invitca comes with that of quality and workmanship that you won't find in many other brands.  Great customer service and protection for a must need product.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Boys', 'Clothing', 'Socks', 'Dress Socks']]

Summary: Feels nice and is thin, but still warm
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Socks & Hosiery', 'Tights']]
Review Text: When it's cold, it's easy to wear many layers of tops to keep your upper body warm, but wearing multiple layers of pants seems less comfortable.  I've tried other tights and stockings to wear under my jeans, but they are often uncomfortably scratchy and/or ill-fitted.  These tights feel nice and smooth against your skin.  They also stretch nicely if you have longer legs, and don't "pull down" your pants when you have them underneath.  They are thin, so you don't have to worry about looking "fatter" or anything, yet they are still very warm.  After wearing mine a couple times, I like them so much that I am ordering more so I can wear them on multiple days of the week.

I don't know if its the company or the model of it, but I am going to buy at least three more playtex bras and see how they work...AND, I will be buying at least two more of this bra, in the other colors as well, just in case...but WOW.BOTTOM LINE! BUY THIS BRA!!!!!

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Active Base Layers'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie, Sleep & Lounge', 'Thermal Underwear'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Active', 'Active Base Layers', 'Bottoms'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Sleep & Lounge', 'Thermal Underwear']]
Review Text: I was going to buy some wool long johns but got these instead, my thinking being that, since they are made of "two layers" they would be as warm as two layers of clothing.  I was wrong.  If there are two layers to these long johns, they are paper thin layers.  Plus the sizing is too small.  Since a previous reviewer recommended buying one size larger than you would normally buy, I ordered and extra large instead of large.  Well, it should  have been called extra long, not extra large.  Because they are way too long, but they are tight around the waist, in spite of being a size larger than I normally wear.  Also, the width of the legs is too tight; just barely fits me.  Someone who would  normally wear a size extra large would also have larger leg width and these just would not fit.  I will never buy this brand again.

Review Text: First of all, the belt looks awesome. The problem here, and you'll see this repeated, is the locking mechanism is a pain in the rear when it comes time to take the belt off. It's way to tricky and locks too tight.There are two mechanisms on this belt, there is the ratchet then there is a lock. It's the lock that's the problem. It's way too tight when it locks. You can't get at it with your nail so you end up gyrating around the room trying to see what you're doing and prying with your fingers. As another reviewer pointed out, sometimes you need to get this off quickly.Maybe things will loosen up with use - we'll see.

Other reviews said about the sole coming off and I've ran a bit in these in the rain to get to my car outside and also have even done some workouts inside the house and they are still good. Great buy.

Review Text: I was surprised by how much I like the look and feel of this bag. It's really quite nice! It had a lot of room inside and a ton of pockets for stuff. I love that any of the handles could be removed, even though I probably won't remove them. It does have a mild chemical smell which seems to be disappearing. I got it in the black color, and it's a nice rich black, and very soft. Upon first use it seems to be of good quality. It even comes with a dust cover, which I thought was especially nice for the price. I was swayed to get this by some of the other reviews, and I'm glad I did!

Review Text: As an aviator I was interested in buying these to replace a more expensive pair that were damaged.  The problem is they are way to dark unless you are in full sun.  When in full sun it is hard see through these glasses. Around the edges you get a lot of sun pouring in so that your eyes can not adjust properly to the dark center.  Also if you are a pilot and looking outside and then look down at your instrument panel you can not see it. I an sure that some will say you get what you pay for and they are right.  In this case though they may look cool, but do not drive or operate any equipment while wearing them.  You will have a hard enough time just walking around not bumping into things

Review Text: This is the first corset I have bought, and I really struggled to choose the right size. Somehow I managed! I followed the size chart posted by the top reviewer on this item. I am average sized; about 30 inch waist, 36B, 5'4" and about 130 pounds. Usually I wear a size 8 or 10. I purchased this in a large and it fits almost perfectly. On me, the bottom half of the corset is completely closed, but I have to leave some of the top laces loose so it will zip over my chest.It's very flattering, and actually pretty comfortable. Beautiful shade of red, exactly what I was hoping for. One star off just because the matching thong seems to be too large. The waist on it is fine, but the other string just sort of... hangs.Overall, a very sexy little piece. I can't wait to surprise my boyfriend with this on his birthday.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Dresses'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Dresses']]
Review Text: This dress is very nice, and elegant.  Some people said it looks costume-ish, but I personally disagree.  I find the asymmetrical layers to be very pretty and adds nice, classy length.  The dress itself is very flattering, and fits a little loose.  I personally like that because I think it thins me out, but personal taste applies here, so keep this in mind.  The picture is very accurate as to what the dress will look like.  The only thing is that it's a bit long.  I fixed that by trimming one of the layers, and then it looked nice.  I love this dress, and I think it could work for events, weddings, or maybe even casual with the right shoes.  I love it, and for the price, I couldn't ask for better.  If you want something that looks expensive and is extremely classy and foolproof, you'll have to spend more than $50.  Otherwise, for the price, this dress is phenomenal, and I'm proud to where it.  It's definitely worth the price, and I feel confident, and tall in it.  I love it, and highly recommend it.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Jewelry: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Available for International Shipping'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Sport Watches'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Timex'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Timex test'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Watches', 'Wrist Watches']]
Review Text: I've had my Ironman watch for close to 10 years. So why am I posting a review now?Because I received a superior service from Timex that warrants a write-up.After years of faithful service the wrist band on the Ironman watch came off on one side. I looked up where I can find a replacement and found that Timex will replace the band on its watches for free.I called the 800 number and sure enough, they told me to package it up, write a note that it is for band replacement only, told me to enclose a check for a very modest shipping cost to send it back to me. Four weeks later  and my watch arrived back: new band and the back looks shinier. Looks like they cleaned its exterior as well.This has been one of my favorite watches1) I like the nice clear large display. Easy to see even with my now presbyopic eyes.2) Setting the watch is easy without a manual3) There is enough useful features, but not so many that the it makes it too complex to do simple things4) Even though it is a men's watch I a female who wear is and I don't find it heavy or bulky5) I like the plastic watch band. My previous Timex had a Velcro band and eventually it picked up a lot of lint it did not close well. And now that I found that Timex will replace it for a cost of shipping it back, I am even more pleased with it.6) The battery lasts a reasonable time, I have to replace it every 2-3 years. Not often enough to be annoying. The battery in my "dressed-up" watch lasts only a year.I am very pleased with the watch, and now extremely pleased with the service as well.Ali Julia review

Review Text: I had to search several websites to make up my mind about which bag to order; that's my only complaint. It would be much easier to make a decision if all the information about the different sizes and varities of bags were posted on the Amazon website. I finally decided on the XS leather tote and am very happy with it. I'm fairly petite, only 5'2", so the XS is the perfect size for me. The bag is very good quality; the leather is beautiful, and the craftmanship is excellent. For a small bag, it's very roomy inside with several different-sized pockets. It's also very lightweight and causes no stress or pulling on my neck and shoulder. I anticipate using this bag for many years and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a good quality, beautiful, and easy on the neck, shoulder and back bag.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Watches', 'Wrist Watches']]
Review Text: This watch is easily worth the $8.99 Amazon is charging now. This the 3rd one I've purchased since Chistmas. My daughter has had this since the 1st of the year. She wears it 3 or 4 times a week at college. The crystal is now cracked but otherwise it looks great and keeps time properly.I got one for my wife about 6 weeks ago and got a 3rd as a spare since both of them like the watch quite a bit.HOWEVER there is NO way this watch is worth a list price of $93.99. While the quailty is great for $8.99 it would be horrible for $90. As a former jeweler this is 'novelty' watch - a watch to wear for special events, etc. If you were to wear this every day you would be lucky if it lasted 2 months.So, in summary, buy it if you're going to wear it a few times a week but this is NOT a everyday watch that will last for years.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie, Sleep & Lounge', 'Intimates', 'Bras', 'Everyday Bras'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Intimates', 'Bras', 'Everyday Bras']]
Review Text: I got this in the mail pretty quickly, received ahead of time; could just be luck though.The package was discrete and the bra was encased in plastic inside the envelope, tagged, clean, and good looking.Quality is great for what you pay for, I imagine I will have this for a long time. It's rather pretty.Why only 4 stars? I'm a 36D (I'm 5'7" and 136lbs) sometimes I am a DD depending on the brand but, in most cases I am a D. I ordered a 36 size bra. Though the 1/4 cup would probably fit a C, this does not fit perfectly for me as a D. I can still wear it, my boyfriend loves it, but It's not something I feel totally sexy in simply because of the fit.  the wire does not follow my breasts and does not run parallel to my sternum which I think most women look for in a bra. Since the bra has little support, the bra stretches forward giving more of a "shelf" effect and less of a bustier look. I kind of get a "muffin" look too if you know what I mean.

Review Text: the shoes are beautiful, and look even better in person. the only complaint i have is a few of the beads fell off (but its all the way on top, where it's not noticeable) and there was some glue left on the platform, which i was able to scrape off. i used to wear shoe size 7- 7.5  but after my pregnancy my foot got wider, so i ordered these in size 8 and they are still just a little snug, but it's definitely not sellers fault, since I'm not really sure what size my foot is now.. perhaps i should've ordered size 8.5, but even in a size 8 i was able to walk, and I'm sure they will stretch out with a few wears. over all i am pleased with my purchase and the shipping was very fast too!

Review Text: I need to be a superhero this year for Halloween to go with the rest of my family who will be Batman and Robin.  I looked at a lot of Wonder Woman costumes and all of the ones for women are "sexy" with a low cut top and frequently a bared midriff.  Well, I just want to be a nice rated-G Wonder Woman so I thought I would try a Child's large size because I am petite (5'1").  The costume surprisingly fits great and is very cute.  My husband likes it because it looks a bit cheerleader-ish (men!).  The costume is a one-piece with a belt to add.  The shirt is a good length for me hitting alittle above mid-thigh but I will wear it with legging or tights.  The headband, shoe covers, and wrist wraps are also cute.

Review Text: I purchased these on a whim when I saw them come up as a Lightning Deal.  The reviews were good and I was in need of a new pair of black flats. The only problem I found with the reviews that I read were that they seemed all over the board about what size to order; some said they run small, some said too big and others said just right.  I decided to go with my normal size and hope for the best and I'm glad I did; they fit perfectly! Not too tight, but not to loose and after wearing them a full day I didn't have any blisters or sore spots from uneven wear.  In the future if looking for new shoes, I will definitely give this brand another try.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Skirts'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Skirts']]
Review Text: It's not too small at all (the fabric is very stretchy - I ordered a small) and looks great on. I am 5'4" and 123lbs, but very curvy. I like how the belt emphasizes my small waist and normally it's a problem for me to find something fitted both to my waist and to my considerably wider hip area. This does the trick perfectly, without making it seem that I have humongous hips - very flattering! It hits just beneath the knee. It doesn't look cheap at all. I was concerned about the belt looking cheap, but it's ok. Overall, a very classy skirt. The delivery was very quick as well. I would definitely repurchase - I am actually considering getting more colors.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'B', 'Bearpaw'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Boot Shop', 'Women', 'Fashion', 'Shearling'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Boots']]
Review Text: These are great boots, very warm and cute. The color is a darker chesnut, but a pretty color. The only downside about these boots is they fit snug around my calves and around my foot too...and I have narrow feet.  I only weigh 124 lbs so it's not like I have big calves. I wear a 7 1/2 and ordered an 8 and they just fit..I either need to wear no socks or thin socks. The quality is decent but I think the quality has dropped on bear paws over the last several years as their popularity grew. The foot bed in this boot isn't nearly as soft as the ones I got a few years ago. However, for the price its a good boot and will keep my feet toasty this winter!

Review Text: These hold back my bra straps perfectly! I used to constantly have the problem of my bra straps falling and becoming visible, but these fix that problem. However you do have to loosen your bra straps when you use this product to keep them from feeling too tight and if your bra straps happen to be over a half inch thick it might not hold them in place. Also while they do make your breasts look firmer but in my experience they do not add a full cup size, which is fine because I just bought this product for it's ability to hold my bra straps. This is a excellent, functional product that is very low in price. I would definitely recommend this product.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie, Sleep & Lounge', 'Intimates', 'Bras', 'Sports Bras'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Petite', 'Intimates', 'Bras', 'Sports Bras']]
Review Text: My wife's review of this sports bra: I ordered this bra in 2 different sizes. I am a 33B, so I ordered 32B and 34B because depending on the style, I can fit into either one. In this instance, the 32B was WAY too small. I could barely get it to fasten around my back. And once it was fastened, I felt like it was cutting off circulation! I returned it. The 34B fits as expected. Very comfortable so far. I have only used it for a couple short 6 mile runs, and there were no irritations or hot spots. The real test will be when I run more than 13 miles in it. That seems to be when any irritations occur. It is a bit of a struggle to put on. The trick is to keep the top latch in the back fastened, and then put it on like a tank top. Then I am able to get the lower back hooks fastened without too much trouble. If I didn't leave the top hooks fastened, I would definitely need someone to help me with it, once on.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Wallets, Card Cases & Money Organizers', 'Wallets']]
Review Text: No strange odors as some have mentioned. It smells like leather, which I like. It did have some greenish dust on the inside, most likely from being in a plastic envelope for who knows how long. I wet a paper towel with Windex and wiped it down - problem solved. It's exactly what I needed as far as keeping all my cards together. My only issue with the one I received (I bought it in burgundy) is that every other card slot runs the length of the wallet, so you are in danger of losing a card down inside the slot. I would prefer that they were all card sized in depth. The width is fine, holds the cards securely and all of the slots are leather on mine, not mesh as someone said the one they received was. If you use all of the card slots, there really isn't room for a checkbook, but there are pockets behind the cards for receipts or cash. It's slim and fits in my purse as well or better than a regular wallet.  I think it will look better with time, as most leather does.

Summary: Awesome shoes you wont be disappointed
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'S', 'Salomon'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Running'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Trail Running']]
Review Text: I have read a lot of reviews about these shoes and they are mixed which I find interesting. Firstly best shoe ever Salomon quest 4d GTX which I have, it is a hiking shoe but amazing product. Second best shoes are these for many reasons.Firstly, I find it funny that people whinge about this shoe, but honestly what is better than this shoe in the market for trail running and general exercise - nothing! thats right folks nothing is better than this shoe for the above functions. If someone is not happy with this shoe they are being overly precious.Unlike a lot of reviewers I have flat feet so I need to be very astute when buying shoes because if not designed correctly they are complete waste of money. I am lucky that I can afford to spent thousands on shoes to find the right shoe and I have purchase all if not most of the major brands. After spending many thousands all roads lead back to Saloman.This shoe is awesome, the feel, the fit, the design, the construction all scream quality. When I exercise in them they hold my foot in a neutral position and I don't over pronate which is a sign of quality for someone with rubbish feet like myself.In my opinion the true test of a shoe is not how shoes function with good feet, its how they function with people was bad feet. If you have high arches you can run bare feet or in just about any shoe, but not with people with very flat feet.If you are on the fence with these shoes just get them.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'S', 'Speedo'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Swim'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Big & Tall']]
Review Text: I've been swimming almost every day for the last 5 months and my jammer swimsuits have been fading and wearing out rather quickly in my local pool. Chlorine is the enemy and i swear they dump tons in the pool everyday.  My wife was so embarrassed by my jammers that she insisted on buying a couple new pair.  So far so good.  These Xtra Life Rapid Splice swimsuits by Speedo seem to be holding up much better than my other swimsuits.  Through about 3 weeks in the pool and multiple washes the color has only slightly faded.  The lycra hasn't broken down or started showing signs of looking sheer yet.  These are great training shorts, but i wouldn't race in them.  I've been pretty happy so far.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Swimsuits & Cover Ups', 'Bikinis']]
Review Text: I got the purple one with yellow lace.The purple is very very purple.  One of those more pinkish purples (as opposed to the blue/violet purples).  The yellow is not neon.  It's more of a dark yellow.The fit:I'm 5'6, about 105-110 lbs.  Usually wear a size 1.  32c or 32d chest.The top fits small, but still covers everything.  I could wear it to the beach if I was careful.  Still, I'd say it's the best fit for C and under.Bottoms are slightly too big.  Only slightly.  Very very slightly.  It's probably only noticeable to the person wearing it.The quality:The fabric is cheapy.  I'm not really sure how to describe it.  It's definitely not bathing suit material.  It's kind of not soft.  But it's not offensively rough.  It just feels cheap, but sturdy.Overall, I'm impressed.  It was a good buy for the money.

Summary: Excellent quality and fit, some helpful data...
Categories: [['Sports & Outdoors', 'Clothing', 'Men', 'Socks'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Athletic Socks'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Big & Tall']]
Review Text: First off, I am happy with the thickness, feel and knit quality of this Original Weight and have found that they wash well.My foot is 10 1/8" with the second toe 1/8" longer than the big toe. That would normally be a woman 9.5 or man 8 in US sizing and falls between small and medium in these, on the sizing chart. I read other reviews that suggested these may run just a tad small, and ordered the medium. It is a great fit. Perfect, in fact.I have had other toe socks and am delighted with the superior quality of these, which are 70% Coolmax, 25% Nylon and 10% Lycra. I normally like the moisture absorption of cotton, but over the years have come to be even more fond of the wickingness of Coolmax, and definitely like the durability of Nylon and the lovely caress of Lycra.I immediately ordered three more pairs of these socks. They are, of course, just what I need for my Vibram FiveFinger Seeya running slippers, but also I love having my toes separated in regular shoes, both in warmer weather and as liner sox during the cold New England winters, now that I've gotten used to that feel. I first purchased toe socks 'way back in the 1970s when living in Seattle and shopping at Uwajimaya (did I spell that right?) as they are traditionally worn in Japanese culture.  Now I don't have to fly across the continent or to the Orient to get them!

Summary: Needed to be shunk, but then it was PERFECT!!!
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Sweaters', 'Pullovers'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', "Women's Luxury Brands"]]
Review Text: I am excited to write this review because this sweater, after the wash, is exactly what I wanted.  I am 140lbs, 5'4" and I typically wear a medium on top.  I got a small because the other reviews had said it ran large.  This was an understatement.  It fit like a sack dress.  I wanted it to wear over embellished pants for Christmas.  It came nearly to my knees and would not work.  It was also so wide in the body and so long in the arms, it would have fit a large man.  It was also so thin, it was afraid I would rip it just walking around the house.I took a risk. I washed it in hot water on gentle and then put it in the dryer in a lingerie bag.  It is PERFECT!!!! It shrank to my exact size.  It is so incredibly soft, I can wear it with out anything underneath it.  I am allergic to wool and anything itchy causes a rash, so that is saying something.  It also got much thicker, as felted things do.  It feels like a $300 sweater.  I am in love.
