Review Text: I have owned these shoes for years and tend to wear them until there are holes in the soles.  The double deerskin feels like walking on a cloud.  The greatest thing to wear after a long day on your feet at work.  Love these!!

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Novelty, Costumes & More', 'Novelty', 'Clothing', 'Women', 'Dresses']]
Review Text: I'm a really small woman (5'2" and 102 lbs) so I ordered the xs, which fits perfectly! It's nicely form fitting, but not super tight or anything! The material is soft and much thicker than I expected - which is nice because then I won't have to worry about undergarments showing though (; The design is as pictured, and the color is almost slightly more pink/peach than the photo - which I love even more! Great price, arrived on time, awesome quality!

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'C', 'crocs'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Comfort Shoes'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Mules & Clogs']]
Review Text: These Crocs are like walking on a cloud.  I was lucky enough to catch them on sale here on Amazon which made it even better.  The shoe is very light and cushiony.  It is a tad wide but otherwise runs true to size.  I find that these are equally comfortable with or without socks, just depends on personal preference.  The nubuck leather adds a nice touch.I highly recommend, especially if you are on your feet a lot during the day.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'S', 'Skechers'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Comfort Shoes'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking']]
Review Text: I recently purchased these shoes and have never had any problems with my feet, aside from occasional foot pain from plantar fasciitis. By occasional, I mean rarely. My foot would maybe hurt about 5 minutes or so when walking barefoot in the morning and most days not at all. Well, after wearing these shoes, I now suffer from severe plantar fasciitis. (I am not accusing the company of this, I just find it quite a coincidence that immediately after wearing the shoes this occurred.)I wore them 2 or 3 days for a couple hours at a time and then the foot pain started. My foot hurt with every little step. Even with the support of New Balance my foot still hurts (read: shooting pain). Right now, as I am writing this, my foot is in great pain. I now can only wear my Birkenstocks and I still feel the severe pain with those as well. I hope over time this painful affliction goes away, but right now I am quite disappointed in Skechers. Actually, more than disappointed as now I cannot walk without searing pain in my foot.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Accessories', 'Scarves & Wraps', 'Fashion Scarves']]
Review Text: I bought this scarf as a gift but the quality was so inferior that I decided to give my daughter-in-law something else.

Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Shoes & Accessories: International Shipping Available'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'R', 'Rockport'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Comfort Shoes'], ['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Oxfords']]
Review Text: I bought these for casual/dress wear. The style is excellent. That said, the shoes are a bit stiff, but other reviewers said that they break in easily. As I wore them over a day, that is true. Size is a bit of a problem. I recently purchased other Rockport shoes and found them a half size small, as others have commented. For that reason, I bought a size 11. What a surprise- the shoes were true to size and I needed to get my normal 10.5M. My recommendation is to buy shoes in 2 sizes and return the ones that don't fi.4 month follow up: After wearing these shoes for a while, I have to drop a star. They are tapered more toward the toes than Ican handle. I feel pressure and pain after wearing them for several hours. They do not seem the quality of previous Rocport shoes.

Summary: I am loving this shirt...AND the seller too!
Categories: [['Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops & Tees', 'Blouses & Button-Down Shirts']]
Review Text: This is my first time buying a Patty product and I have to say that I am in love. The shirt itself is so flattering and classy. Perfect for a night out on the town or a casual get together. I wasn't sure how it would look since I have a bit of a pregnancy pooch but this shirt worked. I'm 5'2 and I have a big bust yet this shirt did wonders for me. I would definitely recommend this to all my friends. I am also very happy with the shipping. It was wicked fast! I got it two weeks earlier than the expected delivery time. Thank god for Patty!

Review Text: So i purchased this to use for a snow white costume.  So i cant say how this would hold up for a heavy wedding dress BUT i think it would probably be ok.  Its really a good quality and came packaged nicely. The hoops are adjustable and i like how the waist is a slip/pull tie.
